tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "7EAD5CAE4735682B477729AFBC90D32C", "When you\'re ready to depart, use the caravan summon item in the marked area outside the Node to call the caravan to your location.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "956D6142451978426F2A4096D897CD7E", "Once the caravan arrives at your location, you\'re ready to drive it to your desired destination.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "41F64C6C4EDA19C611A01E95980C73F5", "Gather your friends to help with the journey. Some other players may try to attack your caravan and steal your goods!")
